title: Snowboarding
description: When I first moved to New Zealand I spent 4 months down in Queenstown snowboarding every day. I went from a beginner to doing my first jump within those 4 months.

title: Woodworking
description: After moving to Christchurch I fell in love with the kiwi culture of DIY, overhearing co-workers talking about building things for their children (sandboxes, picnic benches) I decided to buy some tools and learn how to use them.

title: Programming
description: From the age of 12 I have been programming, I attended university studying computer games programming and now my full time job is programming full time.

title: Dog Training
description: My girlfriend and I own a dog together. She is a Staffy cross Shar Pei, and we have lots of fun teaching her to "Roll Over", "Shake" or "Play Dead".
